name: Spiritual Weapon
description: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting modifier. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack.
notes: Attacks with bonus action each turn
Floating weapon that can be moved

material_component.focus_provided: Emblem provides unlimited sacred-oil, Reliquary provides unlimited holy-water
